page.title: 19Arts and Crafts Classes
page.content: A pottery class meet on Mondays in Ysgol Hiraddug from 10.00a.m until 12.00p.m.They make ornaments and things for the house.They get their clay from Shire Hall and the things that they make are fired at Ysgol Bodelwyddan. A sewing class is held every Tuesday at Ysgol Hiraddug for 2 hours.They weave, embroider, make lace toys and decorations.They use thread beads and calico which they buy locally.The class fee is 25p per lesson. Another group that meets in Ysgol Hiraddug is the P.T.A.They make toys bags and things for the house to sell at the P.T.A. fairs.They buy the material from Abacan Market. They don't have any arts and crafts classes at all in Ysgol Melyd.
